name: asesino
description:
a very short story about violence and growing up being haunted by video games and other stuff too

english/español, 2-3 minutes

made for lost histories jam

images from games:

- wolfenstein 3D
- threat
- final fantasy origins
- die hard (dos)
- night slashers
- final fantasy vi
- the elder scrolls iv: oblivion
- drakengard
- the adventures of captain comic
- ultima i: first age of darkness
- final fantasy viii
- king's field ii
- king's field iii

music by fotocopiadora
